content:
I’m a data scientist, dad, coffee enthusiast, budding hiker, and extremely poor skiier living in Bellingham, Washington, USA.
I have a background in engineering (Penn Bioengineering BSE ‘07/MSE ‘17) and psychology, with academic research experience in human memory and social media, personality, and mental health.
summary: I’m a data scientist, dad, coffee enthusiast, budding hiker, and extremely poor skiier living in Bellingham, Washington, USA.
title: About

content:
A work in progress web presence. About me.
Kulshan (Mt Baker) from Park Butte in WA, USA, July 2022
summary: A work in progress web presence.
title: Patrick Crutchley

content:
After neglecting my web presence for way too long, supercres.net is in the process of being revamped using Hugo (and the Congo theme), hosted on Github Pages, with Github Actions to rebuild. I recommend the setup; I’m finding it way easier to edit in VSCode, commit, and push than to log into a CMS.
I just got really tired of finding a decent static-ish Wordpress template.
Naturally it’s not even at its new URL as I write this.
summary: After neglecting my web presence for way too long, supercres.
title: The next iteration of supercres.net
